lead_paragraph: On its own, Kris Jenkins' 3-point shot to win the national championship for Villanova wasn't all that out of the ordinary.

headline.main: Jenkins Becomes Latest on List of Last-Second NCAA Greats
headline.print_headline: Jenkins Becomes Latest on List of Last-Second NCAA Greats

snippet: On its own, Kris Jenkins' 3-point shot to win the national championship for Villanova wasn't all that out of the ordinary....
